title: Faith and Doubt
main_text:
“Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase.”― Martin Luther King Jr.

No Worst, There is None. Pitched Past Pitch of Grief by Gerard Manley Hopkins

I Wake and Feel the Fell of Dark, Not Day by Gerard Manley Hopkins

They are all Gone into the World of Light! By Henry Vaughan

The World by Henry Vaughan

The Water-fall by Henry Vaughan

Dover Beach by Matthew Arnold

Holy sonnet X: Death be not Proud by John Donne

Holy Sonnet XIV: Batter My Heart, Three-personed God by John Donne

The Rime of the Ancient Mariner by Samuel Taylor Coleridge

A Better Resurrection by Christina Rossetti

Hope is a Thing with Feathers by Emily Dickinson
